tips.tip: You can use ESC to close interfaces

The fishing plugin will highlight fishing spots,
 but only if you have a rod in your inventory
The Zalcano plugin will show the amount of damage dealt to her shield as well as her health
You can play with different settings profiles by using the --config flag

You can move overlays by holding the alt key
and dragging them, reset them to their
orignal position by shift-right clicking them
You can hide the sidebar quickly by pressing ctrl+f11
You can split or detach infoboxes from each other by shift-right-clicking them
Anti-drag requires being in shift-click mode in PvP situations
